display_long_description:
· Awareness of the dangers of drug abuse
> Experience the effects of incorrect use of drugs on physical and mental health in a virtual environment.
Through this, we understand the long-term consequences and risks of substance abuse and learn the importance of prevention.

· Learn how to take the right medication
> Specifically educate the types of drugs, how to take them properly, and precautions when using them.
Users check virtual drug boxes and prescriptions and practice adhering to prescribed doses and methods.

· How to deal with peer pressure situations
> Simulate in VR situations where you are trying to take unknown drinks or drugs at the recommendation of your friend, and practice making correct judgments and expressing your rejection.
Experience social pressure situations that can actually occur and learn healthy countermeasures.

· drinking and smoking prevention education
> Focus on experiencing and raising awareness of the physical and mental effects of drinking and smoking among adolescents. Strengthen self-control by practicing rejecting suggestions for drinking and smoking.

· How to prevent addiction and ask for help
> Learn the initial symptoms of drug addiction and how to prevent it.
Learn the process of asking for help for friends or yourself at risk of addiction, and guide organizations and methods to get help if necessary.
